mapper.select: SELECT b.booking_id, b.user_id, b.lodging_id, b.user_name, b.price_per_night, b.check_in_date, b.check_out_date, b.total_price, b.booking_status, l.name AS lodging_name, r.score, r.comment_text FROM tbl_booking b JOIN tbl_lodging l ON b.lodging_id = l.lodging_id LEFT JOIN tbl_review r ON (b.user_id = r.user_id AND b.lodging_id = r.lodging_no) WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.check_in_date DESC
